Verses: 1 avar Appuram Pogaiyil Piravikkurudanaagiya Oru Manushanaik Kandaar.
2 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avarai Nokki: Rabee, Ivan Kurudanaaip Pirandhadhu Yaar Seydha Paavam, Ivanseydha Paavamo, Ivanaip Petravargal Seydha Paavamo Endru Kettaargal.
3 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Adhu Ivan Seydha Paavamumalla, Ivanaip Petravargal Seydha Paavamumalla, Dhevanudaiya Kiriyaigal Ivanidaththil Velippadumporuttu Ippadip Pirandhaan.
4 pagarkaalamirukkumattum Naan Ennai Anuppinavarudaiya Kiriyaigalai Seyyavendum; Oruvanum Kiriyai Seyyakkoodaadha Raakkaalam Varugiradhu.
5 naan Ulagaththilirukkaiyil Ulagaththirku Oliyaayirukkiren Endraar.
6 ivaigalai Solli, Avar Tharaiyile Thuppi, Umizhneerinaal Serundaakki, Andha Setraik Kurudanudaiya Kangalinmel Poosi:
7 nee Poi, Seelovaam Kulaththile Kazhuvu Endraar. Seelovaam Enbadharku Anuppappattavan Endru Arththamaam. Appadiye Avan Poik Kazhuvi, Paarvaiyadaindhavanaaith Thirumbivandhaan.
8 appozhudhu Ayalagaththaarum, Avan Kurudanaayirukkaiyil Avanaik Kandirundhavargalum: Ivan Utkaarndhu Pichchaik Kettukkondirundhavanallavaa Endraargal.
9 silar: Avandhaan Endraargal. Verusilar: Avanudaiya Saayalaayirukkiraan Endraargal. Avano: Naandhaan Avan Endraan.
10 appozhudhu Avargal Avanai Nokki: Un Kangal Eppadith Thirakkappattadhu Endraargal.
11 avan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Yesu Ennappatta Oruvar Serundaakki, En Kangalinmel Poosi, Nee Poi Seelovaam Kulaththile Kazhuvu Endraar. Appadiye Naan Poik Kazhuvi, Paarvaiyadaindhen Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Avargal: Avar Enge Endraargal. Avan: Enakkuth Theriyaadhu Endraan.
13 kurudanaayirundha Avanaip Pariseyaridaththirkuk Konduponaargal.
14 yesu Serundaakki, Avan Kangalai Thirandha Naal Oivu Naalaayirundhadhu.
15 aagaiyaal Pariseyarum Avanai Nokki: Nee Eppadip Paarvaiyadaindhaai Endru Marupadiyum Kettaargal. Adharku Avan: Avar En Kangalinmel Setraip Poosinaar, Naan Kazhuvinen, Kaangiren Endraan.

16 appozhudhu Pariseyaril Silar: Andha Manushan Oivunaalaik Kaikkollaadhadhinaal Avan Dhevanidaththilirundhu Vandhavanalla Endraargal. Verusilar: Paaviyaayirukkira Manushan Ippadippatta Arpudhangalai Eppadi Seyvaan Endraargal. Ivvidhamaai Avargalukkulle Pirivinaiyundaayitru.
17 marupadiyum Avargal Kurudanai Nokki: Un Kangalaith Thirandhaane, Avanaikkuriththu Nee Enna Sollugiraai Endraargal. Adharku Avan: Avar Theerkkadharisi Endraan.
18 avan Kurudanaayirundhu Paarvaiyadaindhadhai Yoodhargal Nambaamal, Paarvaiyadaindhavanudaiya Thaaithagappanmaarai Azhaippiththu,
19 avargalai Nokki: Ungal Kumaaran Kurudanaaip Pirandhaan Endru Sollugireergale, Avan Ivandhaanaa? Ivanaanaal, Ippozhudhu Ivan Eppadip Paarvaiyadaindhaan Endru Kettaargal.
20 thaaithagappanmaar Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ivan Engal Kumaarandhaan Endrum, Kurudanaaip Pirandhaan Endrum Engalukkuth Theriyum.

21 ippozhudhu Ivan Paarvaiyadaindha Vagai Engalukkuth Theriyaadhu; Ivan Kangalaith Thirandhavan Innaan Enbadhum Engalukkuth Theriyaadhu, Ivan Vayadhullavanaayirukkiraan, Ivanaik Kelungal, Ivane Solluvaan Endraargal.

22 avanudaiya Thaaithagappanmaar Yoodhargalukku Bayandhadhinaal Ippadi Sonnaargal. Enenil Yesuvaik Kristhu Endru Evanaavadhu Arikkaippanninaal Avanai Jebaaalayaththukkup Purambaakkavendumendru Yoodhargal Adharkumunname Kattuppaadu Seydhirundhaargal.
23 adhinimiththam: Ivan Vayadhullavanaayirukkiraan, Ivanaiye Kelungal Endru Avan Thaaithagappanmaar Sonnaargal.
24 aadhalaal Avargal Kurudanaayirundha Manushanai Irandaandharam Azhaiththu: Nee Dhevanai Magimaippaduththu; Indha Manushan Paaviyendru Naangal Arindhirukkirom Endraargal.
25 avan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Avar Paaviyendru Enakkuth Theriyaadhu; Naan Kurudanaayirundhen, Ippozhudhu Kaangiren; Idhu Ondrudhaan Enakkuththeriyum Endraan.
26 avargal Marupadiyum Avanai Nokki: Unakku Ennaseydhaan, Un Kangalai Eppadith Thirandhaan Endraargal.
27 avan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Munname Ungalukku Sonnen, Neengal Kelaamar Poneergal; Marupadiyum Ketka Vendiyadhenna? Avarukku Seesharaaga Ungalukkum Manadhundo Endraan.
28 appozhudhu Avargal Avanai Vaidhu: Nee Avanudaiya Seeshan, Naangal Moseyinudaiya Seeshar.
29 moseyudane Dhevan Pesinaarendru Arivom, Ivan Engeyirundhu Vandhavanendru Ariyom Endraargal.
30 adharku Andha Manushan: Avar En Kangalaith Thirandhirundhum, Avar Engeyirundhu Vandhavarendru Neengal Ariyaadhirukkiradhu Aachchariyamaana Kaariyam.
31 paavigalukku Dhevan Sevikodukkiradhillaiyendru Arindhirukkirom; Oruvan Dhevabakthiyullavanaayirundhu Avarukku Siththamaanadhai Seydhaal Avanukku Sevikoduppaar.
32 piravikkurudanudaiya Kangalai Oruvan Thirandhaanendru Ulagamundaanadhumudhal Kelvippattadhillaiye.
33 avar Dhevanidaththilirundhu Varaadhirundhaal Ondrum Seyyamaattaare Endraan.
34 avargal Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Muzhuvadhum Paavaththil Pirandha Nee Engalukkup Podhikkiraayo Endru Solli, Avanaip Purambe Thallivittaargal.
35 avanai Avargal Purambe Thallivittadhai Yesu Kelvippattu, Avanaik Kandapodhu: Nee Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiraayaa Endraar.
36 adharku Avan: Aandavare, Avaridaththil Naan Visuvaasamaayirukkumpadikku Avar Yaar Endraan.
37 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Avaraik Kandirukkiraai, Unnudane Pesugiravar Avardhaan Endraar.
38 udane Avan: Aandavare, Visuvaasikkiren Endru Solli, Avaraip Panindhukondaan.
39 appozhudhu Yesu : Kaanaadhavargal Kaanumpadiyaagavum, Kaangiravargal Kurudaraagumpadiyaagavum Nyaayaththeerppukku Naan Indha Ulagaththil Vandhen Endraar.
40 avarudanekooda Irundha Pariseyaril Silar Ivaigalaik Kettapozhudhu: Naangalum Kurudaro Endraargal.
41 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Kurudaraayirundhaal Ungalukkup Paavamiraadhu; Neengal Kaangirom Endru Sollugirapadiyinaal Ungal Paavam Nilainirkiradhu Endraar.
